message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'll find valuable. I'm offering it to you for $180.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $150 for it.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I'm willing to come down a bit, how about $165?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $145 for the product.
Bob, I'm trying to make this work, but I need to get a bit more. How about we split the difference and call it $155?
Hello Alice, I've considered your latest offer, but I believe I can't go above $140 for the product. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
Bob, this is my final offer.  $147, and I can't go any lower.
Alice, I understand your position, but I can't agree to $147. Let's try $142. I hope this brings us closer to closing the deal.
